General.Name: Planet Properindo Jaya Pt
General.Description: PT Planet Properindo Jaya Tbk engages in hotel operation business. It operates Vue Palace hotel, a 4-star hotel located in Bandung, which includes superior, deluxe, and junior suite and suite rooms, as well as restaurant, poolside bar, meeting rooms, outdoor swimming pool, cafe, and gymnasium spa and fitness facilities. The company is based in Bandung, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Otto Iskandar Dinata No.3, Bandung, Indonesia, 40117
